DR.GPSM 0.0.1

GPS-matching ATE estimator (numeric-column interface)

gps_matching.Rd

GPS-matching ATE estimator (numeric-column interface)

Usage

gps_matching(data, treatment, outcome, pred, contrast, nboot)

Arguments

data

Data frame pre-processed by gps_pre_process()

treatment

Column index of the treatment variable

outcome

Column index of the outcome variable

pred

K × n cross-fitted residual matrix from the outcome model

contrast

C(K, 2) × K contrast matrix generated by build_contrast()

nboot

Number of bootstrap replications (default = 500)

Value

A list with components:

estimate

Named numeric vector of estimated ATEs for each contrast

ci_lower

Named numeric vector of lower 95% confidence bounds

ci_upper

Named numeric vector of upper 95% confidence bounds
